mapper.sql: id, brand, factory_number, goods_name, imges, spec_desc, dema_quan, statr_data, end_data,sjend_data, state, remarks, tenant_id,delete_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from jsh_sample
order by ${orderByClause}
select s.goods_name from jsh_sample s where s.goods_name is not null and s.goods_name!='' and ifnull(s.delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by s.goods_name order by s.goods_name asc
select s.brand from jsh_sample s where s.brand is not null and s.brand!='' and ifnull(s.delete_flag,'0') !='1' group by s.brand order by s.brand asc

select * FROM jsh_sample where 1=1
and name like '%${name}%'
and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1' order by id desc
mapper.insert: insert into jsh_sample (id, brand, factory_number, goods_name, imges, spec_desc, dema_quan, statr_data, end_data,sjend_data, state, remarks, tenant_id,delete_flag ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imges,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demaQuan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statrData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into jsh_sample
id,
brand,
factory_number,
goods_name,
imges,
spec_desc,
dema_quan,
statr_data,
end_data,
sjend_data,
state,
remarks,
tenant_id,
delete_flag,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{factoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{imges,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{specDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{demaQuan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{statrData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{endData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sjendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{delete_flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM jsh_sample WHERE 1=1
and goods_name like '%${name}%'
and brand=#{brand}
and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1'
mapper.update:
update jsh_sample
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
brand = #{record.brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
factory_number = #{record.factoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{record.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imges = #{record.imges,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spec_desc = #{record.specDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dema_quan = #{record.demaQuan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
statr_data = #{record.statrData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_data = #{record.endData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sjend_data = #{record.sjendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenant_id = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
delete_flag = #{record.deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update jsh_sample set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, brand = #{record.brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_number = #{record.factoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{record.goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imges = #{record.imges,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec_desc = #{record.specDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dema_quan = #{record.demaQuan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, statr_data = #{record.statrData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_data = #{record.endData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjend_data = #{record.sjendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{record.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{record.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_id = #{record.tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} delete_flag = #{record.deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update jsh_sample
brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
factory_number = #{factoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
imges = #{imges,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spec_desc = #{specDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dema_quan = #{demaQuan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
statr_data = #{statrData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_data = #{endData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sjend_data = #{sjendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update jsh_sample set brand = #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, factory_number = #{factoryNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, imges = #{imges,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spec_desc = #{specDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dema_quan = #{demaQuan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, statr_data = #{statrData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_data = #{endData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sjend_data = #{sjendData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update jsh_sample set state ='1' where 1=1 and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1' and id = #{id}
update jsh_sample set state ='0' where 1=1 and ifnull(delete_flag,'0') !='1' and id = #{id}
